traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargoyle makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage.
